entry.sentence: One evening , as he stood silent and lonely in his villa by the window , looking out , as he often did , at the windows of Rosemary 's room , he asked himself , `` Now , if she really loved you , what would you do ?
entry.parse: (ROOT (S (NP (CD One) (NN evening)) (, ,) (SBAR (IN as) (S (NP (PRP he)) (VP (VBD stood) (ADJP (JJ silent) (CC and) (JJ lonely)) (PP (IN in) (NP (PRP$ his) (NN villa))) (PP (IN by) (NP (DT the) (NN window))) (, ,) (S (VP (VBG looking) (PRT (RP out)))) (, ,) (SBAR (IN as) (S (NP (PRP he)) (ADVP (RB often)) (VP (VBD did) (, ,) (PP (IN at) (NP (NP (DT the) (NNS windows)) (PP (IN of) (NP (NP (NNP Rosemary) (POS 's)) (NN room))))))))))) (PRN (, ,) (S (NP (PRP he)) (VP (VBD asked) (NP (PRP himself)))) (, ,)) (`` ``) (ADVP (RB Now)) (, ,) (SBAR (IN if) (S (NP (PRP she)) (ADVP (RB really)) (VP (VBD loved) (NP (NP (PRP you)) (, ,) (SBAR (WHNP (WP what)) (S (VP (MD would)))))))) (NP (PRP you)) (VP (VBP do)) (. ?)))

entry.sentence: Would you have the courage to hold her , against all odds , she-the daughter of an adventuress ? ''
entry.parse: (ROOT (SQ (MD Would) (NP (PRP you)) (VP (VBP have) (NP (DT the) (NN courage) (S (VP (TO to) (VP (VB hold) (NP (PRP her)) (, ,) (PP (IN against) (NP (NP (DT all) (NNS odds)) (, ,) (NP (NP (JJ she-the) (NN daughter)) (PP (IN of) (NP (DT an) (NNS adventuress))))))))))) (. ?) ('' '')))

entry.sentence: And he threw back his head with shining eyes .
entry.parse: (ROOT (S (CC And) (NP (PRP he)) (VP (VBD threw) (PRT (RP back)) (NP (PRP$ his) (NN head)) (PP (IN with) (NP (VBG shining) (NNS eyes)))) (. .)))

entry.sentence: `` Yes - yes , I would hold her , for she is blameless and pure , and her love would make me the happiest of mortals .
entry.parse: (ROOT (S (`` ``) (ADVP (RB Yes)) (: -) (S (INTJ (UH yes)) (, ,) (NP (PRP I)) (VP (MD would) (VP (VB hold) (NP (PRP her)) (, ,) (SBAR (IN for) (S (NP (PRP she)) (VP (VBZ is) (NP (NP (NNS blameless)) (CC and) (NP (JJ pure))))))))) (, ,) (CC and) (S (NP (PRP$ her) (NN love)) (VP (MD would) (VP (VB make) (S (NP (PRP me)) (NP (NP (DT the) (NN happiest)) (PP (IN of) (NP (NNS mortals)))))))) (. .)))

entry.sentence: Only in her do I find the completion of my self . ''
entry.parse: (ROOT (S (RB Only) (ADVP (RB in)) (NP (PRP her)) (VP (VBP do) (SBAR (S (NP (PRP I)) (VP (VBP find) (NP (NP (DT the) (NN completion)) (PP (IN of) (NP (PRP$ my) (NN self)))))))) (. .) ('' '')))

entry.sentence: And since that evening it was certain with him not to let Rosemarie go away without asking her if she loved him .
entry.parse: (ROOT (S (CC And) (PP (IN since) (NP (DT that) (NN evening))) (NP (PRP it)) (VP (VBD was) (NP (NP (JJ certain)) (PP (IN with) (NP (PRP him)))) (S (RB not) (VP (TO to) (VP (VB let) (S (NP (NNP Rosemarie)) (VP (VB go) (ADVP (RB away)) (PP (IN without) (S (VP (VBG asking) (NP (PRP her)) (SBAR (IN if) (S (NP (PRP she)) (VP (VBD loved) (NP (PRP him)))))))))))))) (. .)))
